name: Darts Tournament
description:
Test your dart throwing skills and WIN real PRIZES. The stakes have never been higher!

Train, prepare, hone your skill and when you’re ready - play for real cash prizes! Thanks to the cooperation with the eSports platform Skillz, “Darts Tournament” allows you to play for real prizes!

The game will pit you against opponents of similar level and let you challenge them in a game of skill. “Darts Tournament” features sophisticated, easy to use but difficult to master darts gameplay. Start playing, get the hang of it and win big!

Remember - you play for money only if you want to. You can practice playing for in-game currency as much as you need to before you take on opponents online!
